name: Frost Salamander
description:
Frost salamanders are reptilian elemental creatures that radiate intense cold.

**Combat**: Claw and bite attacks with freezing aura.

**Habitat/Society**: Frozen wastelands.

**Ecology**: Hunt warm-blooded prey.

name: Fungus, Violet
description:
Violet fungi are deadly plants that rot flesh with their touch.

**Combat**: Release rotting spores.

**Habitat/Society**: Cavern floors.

**Ecology**: Decomposers feeding on organic material.
